keyword: how many calories is in an oreo
title: How Many Calories Are in an Oreo?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in an oreo, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and tweaks for variations like double stuf.
h1: How Many Calories Are in an Oreo?
assumptions: Standard Oreo cookie (~10 g), chocolate wafers with creme filling; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact size, and recipe changes. Check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One standard Oreo cookie contains about 53 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Dipped in milk (1 oz whole milk)

faqs.q: How many calories is in an oreo?
faqs.a: One standard Oreo has about 53 kcal.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one Oreo?
faqs.a: Approximately 7.3 g carbs, including 3.9 g sugars and 0.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does an Oreo have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.7 g protein and 2.5 g fat (0.4 g saturated).

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an Oreo?
Are there trans fats in Oreos?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat per serving.
